gen:link.msg:message: `IncomeFromInvestments` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit5_IncomeFromInvestments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit5_IncomeFromInvestments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit5_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit5_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit5_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit5_ChildrenOfIncomeFromInvestmentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the current period) SHOULD be reported, because `NetResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the previous period) and `ResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the current period) are reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set01NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params1_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the previous period) SHOULD be reported, because `NetResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the current period) and `ResultAfterTax` (at the end of / during the previous period) are reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set01NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set01NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set02ResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set02ResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set03NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1Exist02ANDThnExist01Params2_Set03NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_NetResultAfterTax')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_NetResultAfterTax return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfNetResultAfterTaxCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfNetResultAfterTaxCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfNetResultAfterTaxDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfNetResultAfterTaxDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`NetResultAfterTax` SHOULD exist at least once within the same context, because `ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1ExistenceThnExistenceCovU1_ResultAttributableNoncontrollingInterest return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OperatingExpenses` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_OperatingExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_OperatingExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfOperatingExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`OperatingIncome` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_OperatingIncome')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_OperatingIncome return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfOperatingIncomeCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfOperatingIncomeCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfOperatingIncomeDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit4_ChildrenOfOperatingIncomeDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RealisedChangesInValueOfInvestments` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_RealisedChangesInValueOfInvestments')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_RealisedChangesInValueOfInvestments return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_ChildrenOfRealisedChangesInValueOfInvestmentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_ChildrenOfRealisedChangesInValueOfInvestmentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_ChildrenOfRealisedChangesInValueOfInvestmentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedIncomeStatementInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit7_ChildrenOfRealisedChangesInValueOfInvestmentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
